DbValues.summary: Represents a collection of DbValue objects.

remarks.para:
The common collection static methods are: HasItems() and LJCDeserialize().
The collection contains a copy constructor.
The common collection instance methods are: Add(), Clone, HasItems() and LJCSerialize().
Public methods are: LJCClearChanged() and LJCGetChanged().

The get data methods are: LJCGetBoolean(), LJCGetInt32(), LJCGetValue(), etc..
The set data method is LJCSetValue().
A DbValues collection can be converted to a DbColumns collection using the LJCCreateColumns() method.

Add.summary: Creates the Object from the arguments and adds it to the collection.
Add.returns: A reference to the added item.

LJCCreateColumns.summary: Creates combined DbColumns from DbColumns and DbValues.

LJCClearChanged.summary: Sets the IsChanged value to false for all elements in the collection.

LJCGetChanged.summary: Gets a collection of changed columns.

LJCSetValue.summary: Sets the object value for the column with the specified name.
